issue.title: Set bitbucket build status for default and release branch builds

content.raw: I wouldn't propose to change the bitjen server yet, but rather to call the [_bitbucket-set_status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_bitbucket-set_status/) job to record the build status for all the jenkins jobs we are already running. I think the `_bitbucket-set_status` job is currently only triggered by the `.*-ci-pr_any` meta job.
